attributes.action: Less Stricter Uniform Policies In Secondary Schools
attributes.background: I would love for the parliament to keep school uniform, but make the rules say that you can wear shorts and a T-shirt in summer or coats in the winter

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require schools prioritise comfort in uniforms & more personal choice for pupils
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751980
